global.title: Shenzhen Hengyunchang Vacuum Technology Co., Ltd.
global.description: Shenzhen Hengyunchang Vacuum Technology Co., Ltd., established on March 19, 2013, specializes in the technical development, consultation, and sales of vacuum equipment, vacuum plasma power supplies, new energy materials, semiconductor devices, gas mass flow meters, vacuum pumps, cathodes, targets, and electromechanical products.

casesPage.title: Case Studies
casesPage.subtitle: Explore Our RF Power Solutions
casesPage.description: Shenzhen Hengyunchang Vacuum Technology Co., Ltd. provides innovative RF power solutions for various industries. Here are our successful case studies:

caseStudy1.title: 5G Base Station Power Solution
caseStudy1.description: High-efficiency RF power supply for next-gen 5G base stations
caseStudy1.content: We developed an efficient and stable RF power solution for a major telecommunications equipment manufacturer for their 5G base station equipment. This solution utilizes advanced power conversion technology, maintaining over 95% efficiency even in high-temperature environments, significantly reducing base station energy consumption and cooling requirements.

caseStudy2.title: Military Radar System
caseStudy2.description: RF amplification system for military radar
caseStudy2.content: Developed for defense clients, this RF amplification system is used in next-generation military radar. The power system features extremely high power density (>1kW/L) and excellent electromagnetic compatibility, operating stably in extreme environments while meeting stringent military standards.

caseStudy3.title: Medical Imaging Equipment
caseStudy3.description: Dedicated power supply for medical imaging devices
caseStudy3.content: Developed for high-end medical imaging equipment, this specialized RF power solution is used in MRI and CT scanners. The solution achieves ultra-low noise (<0.1% ripple) and precise power control, ensuring imaging quality while complying with medical device safety standards.
